placeholder: Please paste your agent configuration JSON here

workflow_config.name: AI-Powered File Organization System
workflow_config.description: Intelligent file organization using AI with Zettelkasten methodology

parameters.prompt_template:
Analyze the following files and suggest organization:

Files: {files}
Folders: {folders}

Group files into logical categories and suggest folder names. Consider:
- File content and purpose
- Zettelkasten numbering system
- Thematic relationships
- User preferences from history

Output structured JSON with categories and suggested moves.

file_classification.system_message: You are an expert file organizer using the Zettelkasten method. Your goal is to create a logical, searchable knowledge base.

content_analysis.system_message: You are a content analyst. Extract key themes and topics from file content.
content_analysis.user_template:
Analyze this content:
{content}

Extract:
- Main topics
- Key concepts
- Suggested tags
- Zettelkasten category
